tab1.text1:
All rules must be followed. They are subject to change at any time. 3 Warns = 1 Week ban.

1.1 Multiple accounts, cheating and abusing exploits will lead you to a permaban without any warning.

1.2 Admins are not forced to return items or lost dinos due to in-game situations, bugs or rollbacks.

1.3 Mass breeding is forbidden to avoid server lags. Useless dinos must be stored.

1.4 Handcuffing players is allowed but it must not last more than an hour.

1.5 Teaming is forbidden. Raids are only between 2 tribes. Any interference by a 3rd tribe at a raid is considered teaming unless legally countered (clear attempts of raid with a counter fob, no sniping only)

1.6 Destroying structures through the mesh is forbidden. Using Gigas or other dinos to mesh biting is allowed.

1.7 Harassment, racism, hate speech or any king of discriminatory speech will be severly punished.

1.8 Insiding and scamming are strictly bannable. Irrefutable proof must be provided.

1.9 Conducting any kind of real-world economic activity by selling in-game items is strictly prohibited.
tab1.text2:
Admins will structure wipe and warn/ban if these rules are not followed.

<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Banned locations</>

General : Obelisks, player spawns and ressources spots.
Island : Swamp Cave, Tek Cave & Volcano
The Center : Ice Palace & Jumping Puzzle.
Scorched Earth : Wyvern trench.
Aberration : Surface & Charge nodes
Extinction : OSDs & Element Veins

2.1 Ratholes are only allowed if you get in through normal movement. (crouching and probing).
Exploits by grapple, KO, beds, tek... are forbidden.

2.2 Max base limit is 3 per tribe per cluster, on separate locations. Any 4th base found will be wiped.

2.3 Do not use tunnels/structures, walls and ceilings to bypass turrets.

2.4 Open-world structures are forbidden, more specifically turrets and gates.

2.5 Raiders must remove their fob within an hour of a successful raid. Defenders are responsible for clearing fobs at their base. Fobs out of render will be treated as open-world structures as seen in the previous rule.

2.6 ORP may only be placed at your base, never at a FOB.

2.7 No building within the mesh. All structures will be wiped without any warning.

2.8 Platform dinos : Do not create line of sight to prevent the dino from taking any damage.

2.9 Any transfer of ownership of bases that are actively being raided is not allowed.

tab2.title1: How to register in-game account to Discord?
tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>You must register in order to claim your kits.</>

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Player Registration</>
● Open Radial Menu and open ASA-Bot (Hold R or X or Square)
● Copy the given 6 digit code.
● Type /confirm on any channel of Discord.
● Paste the 6 digit code and hit Enter.

You are now permanently registered on all servers.
Claim your starter kits on Discord Starter Kits channel.

There is one kit per cluster, useable once a week.
You must be in-game on eligible servers to claim them.
Registration can take up to 10 minutes. Do not open a ticket, we will not manually register you.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Please watch the tutorial posted in #Register if you need more help</>

tab3.text1:
ORP structure is unlocked at level 1 and costs 10 Metal Ingots.
You can place 1 ORP per map per tribe.
This is not a 100% ORP.

Once placed, the ORP will automatically activate after 1h when the last tribe member has logged off the server.
Structures and dinos within the 30-foundation radius of the ORP will receive a 5× resistance buff, and turret damage will receive a 2× damage buff.

Combat logging prevented : If you log off mid-raid, ORP wont activate. If enemy leaves ORP radius, the ORP timer will then start.

ORP structure is Wood and has 5000 HP, all buffs will be removed if it gets destroyed, place it wisely!
You can display its range by interacting with the structure.
When a tribe member logs on, buffs are removed from structures & turrets after a minute.

If no tribe member logs in within 24 hours, ORP structure will be destroyed, removing both structure and turret damage buff.

Purge ORP : Every Saturday at 20:00 UTC all ORP structures will be disabled during 24h.
All ORP structures will then reactivate every Sunday at 20:00 UTC.
